bug.short_desc: Better formating of the migration warnings

long_desc.thetext: I recently wrote some migration data for the form api. During the test of the migration warnings i realized that the formating of the logfile is not really good for a fast understanding and seeing

... whats the warnings and what information you should care of. Take a look at the following example checking one file with four warnings:
- File: /Users/mw/Documents/1und1/workspace/migration/source/class/migration/Application.js - /Users/mw/Documents/1und1/workspace/migration/source/class/migration/Application.js:59: Matches \bsetName\b in - /Users/mw/Documents/1und1/workspace/migration/source/class/migration/Application.js:59: The name property on form widgets is deprecated. Please use qooxdoo user data instead e.g. setUserData("value", value) - /Users/mw/Documents/1und1/workspace/migration/source/class/migration/Application.js:60: Matches \bgetName\b in - /Users/mw/Documents/1und1/workspace/migration/source/class/migration/Application.js:60: The name property on form widgets is deprecated. Please use qooxdoo user data instead e.g. getUserData("value") - /Users/mw/Documents/1und1/workspace/migration/source/class/migration/Application.js:61: Matches \bresetName\b in - /Users/mw/Documents/1und1/workspace/migration/source/class/migration/Application.js:61: The name property on form widgets is deprecated. Please use qooxdoo user data instead. - /Users/mw/Documents/1und1/workspace/migration/source/class/migration/Application.js:62: Matches \bchangeName\b in - /Users/mw/Documents/1und1/workspace/migration/source/class/migration/Application.js:62: The name property on form widgets is deprecated.
As you can see, every warning consists of two lines of code. One showing the file name, the line number and the regexp that machted. The second line showing again the file name, the line number and the warning. It should be clear that some of the information just blows up the log.
So a better solution would look like this:
- File: /Users/mw/Documents/1und1/workspace/migration/source/class/migration/Application.js - Line 59 Matches \bsetName\b : The name property on form widgets is deprecated. Please use qooxdoo user data instead e.g. setUserData("value", value) - Line 60 Matches \bgetName\b : The name property on form widgets is deprecated. Please use qooxdoo user data instead e.g. getUserData("value") - Line 61 Matches \bresetName\b : The name property on form widgets is deprecated. Please use qooxdoo user data instead. - Line 62 Matches \bchangeName\b : The name property on form widgets is deprecated.
The file name will only be printed in the header (nothing changed here) and one line for each warning containing the three information (line number, regexp and the warning itself).
